statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Consider the problem of tiling an n×n chessboard by polyomino pieces that are k×1 in size; Every one of the k pieces of each polyomino tile must align exactly with one of the chessboard squares. Your task is to figure out the maximum number of chessboard squares tiled.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases in the input file.
First line contain the number of cases T ($T \leq 10000$).
In the next T lines contain T cases , Each case has two integers n and k. ($1 \leq n, k \leq 100$)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Print the maximum number of chessboard squares tiled.
